text: KF Vllaznia Shkodër B (), commonly known as Vllaznia Shkodër B was a football club based in Shkodër, Albania that folded in October 2020. It is the reserve team of KF Vllaznia Shkodër. The club last played in the Kategoria e Dytë, which is the third tier of football in the country. ==Current squad== ==References== Vllaznia B B Team
title: KF Vllaznia Shkodër B
